details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 14289-2:202x - 8.4.5 Fonts - 8.4.5.9 Use of .notdef glyph - Use of .notdef glyph
details.description: A file in conformance with PDF/UA-2 shall not contain a reference to the .notdef glyph from any of the text showing operators, regardless of text rendering mode, in any content stream

rule.description: A file in conformance with PDF/UA-2 shall not contain a reference to the .notdef glyph from any of the text showing operators, regardless of text rendering mode, in any content stream

error.message: The document contains a reference to the .notdef glyph
